44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: Khufaf b. Jura' reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said in prayer:O Allah, hurl curse upon the tribe of Lihyan and Ri'l aid Dhakwan and Usayya for they disobeyed Allah and His Messenger, (and for) Ghifar Allah has granted pardon and for the tribe of Aslam Allah has granted safety

chapter.ara-name: باب دُعَاءِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم لِغِفَارَ وَأَسْلَمَ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication Of The Prophet (ﷺ) For Ghifar And Aslam
